title: Internship Trainee- Financial Services ( Mutual Fund)
tagsAndSkills: Finance,Fresher,Capital Market,Mutual Funds,Share Market,Interns,Financial services,Sharing
jobDescription:
Greeting from SS&C Technologies!!


Job Location: Navi-Mumbai (Airoli)


Internship specifications:


1. Internship tenure- 1st Oct until end of December 2024

2. Mode of working : 5 days work from Office

3. Office location : Airoli Mindspace

4. Shift time : UK Shift (from 2 pm to 11 pm)

5. Stipend of INR 15,000 per month (including INR 3000 one-way conveyance allowance)

6. Hire Under Graduate/ Graduate from Campus

7. Interns will not be eligible for any leaves during internship period

8. Finance background is mandatory ( Pursing Graduation/ post graduation can also apply) & pass out can also apply


Job Description:


Focuses on the processing of less complex transactions and becomes familiar with the corresponding system(s). Researches and resolves less complex processing problems. Ensures adherence to legal and procedural standards. Knowledgeable of quality goals and participates in the accomplishment of team quality metrics. • Ensuring the requests is completed thoroughly and accurately within the appropriate time frame adhering to Client SLAs. • Follow daily work patterns and be responsible towards targets. • Prioritize own activities and assist team members as needed in order to meet client deadlines and quality standards. • Provide input into process improvement opportunities. • Ready to work in UK shift (shift starts from 12.00 pm IST onwards) • Performing RCAs and sharing observations with next level. Technical Skills Required: • Good Communications Skills. • Good capital market, share market, Mutual fund knowledge. • AMFIC/NCFM and financial certifications would have added advantage. • Typing skills : alpha numeric (28 wpm) with 98% accuracy

title: Disbursement Executive - Freshers Can also apply
tagsAndSkills: Excel,KYC,Document Verification,Loan Processing,Disbursement,Posting,Verification,Process

ambitionBoxData.Title: Inchcape Shipping Services Reviews by Employees

jobDescription:
The Disbursement Accounts (DA) Executive is responsible for the accurate and timely processing of DAs received from various Inchcape offices as well as third-party agents for crew logistic business:


Duties and Responsibilities:

  • Checking of DAs received from various offices against agreed tariffs of the client.
  • Ensure all DAs are in line with service requests from the client and checking of supporting documents.
  • In case of any discrepancy with rates or supporting documents; query the same with a local office.
  • Complete the DA processing in the optic as per the set process at all stages of DA.
  • Vouching of the Final DA i.e., Putting USD amount and arranging vouchers as per the summary sheet.
  • Create Final DA as per the client's requirements and SOPs.
  • Processing of DAs within two days of receipt or the same working week.
  • Ensure FDAs are reported to the principals within a week after generating.
  • Resolve the principal's queries within 2 working days of receipt and maintain a track record.
  • All the client queries need to be updated the same days after the receipt in the client query file.
  • Assist to the team members in the absence of a supervisor.
  • CWD posting as per the requirement.

Inchcape Systems

  • Full utilization of Inchcape systems as per ISS Standard Operating Procedures.
  • Ensure all jobs are processed accurately and updated at all stages of DA processing in optic.

Teamwork

  • To proactively collaborate with and support colleagues by adopting the spirit of teamwork.
  • To inform colleagues promptly of any emails, tasks, or issues that require immediate attention to enable them to meet the expectations of internal and external customers.
  • To work with all colleagues in a friendly, business-focused, proactive, and cooperative manner.
  • Works cooperatively with others to achieve shared objectives.
  • Share ideas clearly and effectively with team members

Direct Reports:

Supervisor


Person Specification:

Knowledge

  • Proficient with Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint)
  • Must have basic knowledge of shipping.

Understanding of basic shipping terminologies and disbursement Accounts


Skills

  • Good communication skills: Verbal & Written.
  • Initiative
  • Good motivational skills
  • Honest, transparent, and trustworthy
  • Proactive, dynamic and innovative
  • Teamwork

Experience


  • Require a minimum of 1 year to 2 years of experience in Shipping.

title: Business Development Executive
tagsAndSkills: Communication Skills,Presentation Skills,Development,Business development,Presentation
jobDescription:
UtopiaTech is a startup working in IoT segment. It has indigenously developed patented technology for controlling and monitoring remote electrical assets. In the span of last 7 years, we have deployed thousands of IoT devices across India. We are in an exciting phase of growth and are looking for passionate and like-minded people to join us in our exciting journey. At UtopiaTech we believe in free thinking and always encourage innovative ideas.


Job Overview

The Business Development Executive will be responsible for identifying new business opportunities and driving revenue growth. This role requires a proactive individual with a strong understanding of the IoT landscape and a passion for sales and marketing. This will be a techno-commercial role.


Role & responsibilities

  • Conduct thorough market research to identify potential clients, industry trends, and competitive landscape.
  • Identify and qualify leads through various channels, including networking, cold calling, and attending industry events.
  • Build and maintain strong relationships with prospective and existing clients to understand their needs and offer tailored solutions.
  • Develop and implement effective sales strategies to achieve revenue targets and expand UtopiaTechs market presence.
  • Prepare and present compelling business proposals and pitches to potential clients.
  • Work closely with the product development and marketing teams to align business development efforts with company goals.
  • Maintain accurate records of all sales activities and provide regular reports on business development performance to senior management.

Perks and benefits

  • High growth career
  • PF Benefits
